short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically hides political posts on Reddit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of political posts flooding your Reddit feed? The Reddit Political Post Blocker (RPPB) is here to help! This extension filters out political posts, allowing you to enjoy a politics-free browsing experience on Reddit.

With comprehensive keyword filtering, RPPB automatically blocks posts containing political keywords to keep your feed clean. It supports both old and new Reddit, seamlessly filtering posts on both platforms. The extension also displays the subreddit name for blocked posts, giving you more context. If you choose to view a blocked post, the "Open Post" button makes it easy. Experience Reddit the way you wantâ€”free from unwanted political content.

Please note that due to the limitations of filtering by keywords, some posts may still not be filtered, and the addon cannot detect context in images.

1.1 Update
-Added Popup Settings Window: Easily toggle the extension on or off.
-Updated Keywords: Refined list to include recent political terms.
-Added the ability for users to submit suggestions for additional keywords to filter.
